title: pawel7777
author: pawel7777
content: Christine Lagarde, the president of the European Central Bank, got pranked by pranksters posing as Ukraine's president V. Zelensky.In the interview she gave, she admits that the Digital Euro will be all about tracking and control.source tweet: https://twitter.com/KanekoaTheGreat/status/1644116706544189441full video: https://rumble.com/v2ddlps-prank-with-the-president-of-the-european-central-bank-christine-lagarde.html

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: pawel7777 on April 07, 2023, 05:41:02 PMChristine Lagarde, the president of the European Central Bank, got pranked by pranksters posing as Ukraine's president V. Zelensky.In the interview she gave, she admits that the Digital Euro will be all about tracking and control.source tweet: https://twitter.com/KanekoaTheGreat/status/1644116706544189441full video: https://rumble.com/v2ddlps-prank-with-the-president-of-the-european-central-bank-christine-lagarde.htmlI don't know how this could be true because the two people you mentioned are high-profile personalities that can't just be pranked anyhow, not to say of impersonator pranking her. Well, we should not believe everything we read online, particularly those that are not coming from reputable news outlets.That said, everyone knows that CBDC is the latest initiative, it's nonnegotiable over time except if the country or region wants to take the backseat. And the main purpose is to reduce the dominance of cryptocurrencies and enhance control, tracking and accountability.

You are being tracked now! You can just read about it if you google how FATF operates. Why do you think we have KYCs if not for control and tracking? Check dusk network's approach for starters

comments.author: DrBeer
comments.body: I smile broadly when some of the forum participants begin to "bring to the masses" heresy, that everyone is switching to crypto, they say CBDC will be for everyone and everywhere, crypto has won, there is no centralization and state control. I have already written many times CBDC - this is a tool for really total control and influence on people through the state and technology. Until recently, fiat was a completely safe means of payment, although not the most convenient, and I agree with my own set of shortcomings. And now, to the "joy" of some enthusiasts in the CBDC arena! A curtain. And now for some bitter truth about CBDC.CBDC allows:- Totally control not only your transactions, but also extremely easy to track your interactions with other people.- every CBDC cent/penny/.... is a completely state-controlled entity.- while you do not fully dispose of this essence. Your "CBDC bills" can be flagged (you won't know it) and if you commit an offense - ALL your funds will be BLOCKED, in an instantThis technology still has a lot of "interesting functionality" that will work specifically for the state, and for the state.In a word - we rejoice early. From such "joy" to "burning tears" - a very small gap

comments.author: panganib999
comments.body: I mean, that's the very basic notion behind CBDCs, to control, track, and surveil people and their transactions, and to also combat cryptocurrencies in relevance. For anyone who's none the wiser when it comes to cryptocurrency, this may come as a surprise, but everyone with half a mind to realize that a coin coming from a centralized authority will be used to track and control people remotely has been made aware of its detriments a pretty long time ago. Still, despite this sounding like old news to many, this is still quite concerning. With bitcoin there was a high chance of it not becoming as relevant as it is today, but CBDCs are made to be relevant right from the get-go, and this is a planned attack to make cryptocurrencies obsolete ultimately.

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: One of the roles of the Government is control and Digital currencies issued by Government are going to perfect this, if they don't like your face, they can turn your account balance to Zero, I have a feeling that if Government abuses this, the price of Gold will increase significantly because when you know that you have no control of your money, you will seek for alternatives. If you looked at how this was weaponized in China, you will know that there is fire on the mountain

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Pretty sure these people have personal assistants to handle their schedules and talk to each other before they could do this meeting. If they don't then that's a huge problem, because things like these could really happen without them realizing. A good prank, but certainly a dangerous one considering how fast the government operates. This is a dangerous game that they're playing and there's a high possibility that something is already cooking after the incident (if ever it's true).

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: There is nothing to be surprised if Digital Euro is implemented to track people's financing ways.  After all the government is trying its best to pinpoint money transfers of every individual, where it is used and the purpose of its use, and to whom it is sent.  Isn't the form of remittances gives hint about the purposes of the government's financial regulations?  What good thing for the government in implementing Digital currency is that they have the access to the ledger or records of the transactions from point A to point B where the points are known to people due to their information and receiving wallets registered to the government.
